committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Natural Resources, Agriculture Research and Environment

official_title: To require the Environmental Protection Agency to conduct a study and produce a decision aid to assist State and local authorities in planning and manging suburban and rural growth and development while preserving environmental quality.

summary.text: Directs the Environmental Protection Agency, acting through the Office of Research and Development, to: (1) study the environmental implications of growth and development of suburban and rural communities; (2) produce a decision aid to assist State and local authorities in planning and managing such growth and development while preserving environmental quality; and (3) report to the Congress on such decision aid.

titles.title: To require the Environmental Protection Agency to conduct a study and produce a decision aid to assist State and local authorities in planning and manging suburban and rural growth and development while preserving environmental quality.
